Its investigators perform scientifically rigorous research that informs clinical care and health policy. Through building innovative tools and fostering collaboration, our work empowers the most influential decision makers in the field. The mission of the Division’s work is to maximize your quality of life and how long you live. Section on Value and Effectiveness (SOLVE) | Department of Population Health                            Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Department of Population Health                                                                                  Home   About   Faculty   Divisions   Research   Education   Faculty Affairs   News/Events   Contact                                  Home Divisions Comparative Effectiveness and Decision Science Section on Value and Effectiveness (SOLVE)            Print  Email               - A + A                                                                                                                                    Section on Value and Effectiveness (SOLVE)    The Section on Value and Effectiveness (SOLVE) aims to improve healthcare by conducting transferable research that focuses on personalization, prioritization, and resource allocation healthcare services. Simply put, the section uses a variety of research tools to estimate the benefit that healthcare is delivering so we can get more “bang” from our healthcare “buck,” a particularly important concern for the United States, which spends far more money on healthcare per-capita than any other country, yet delivers benefits that are often modest and unevenly distributed.
